Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Officer reasonably concluded misrepresentation of employment history
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review under s. 72(1) of the Act
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's affidavits from employer contradicted officer's findings
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Flawed verification process and lack of procedural fairness
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to properly verify employment details
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: s. 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remitted for reconsideration by a different officer
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Applicant not given adequate opportunity to respond to discrepancies
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Officer questioned applicant’s credibility based on flawed verification
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenged as unreasonable and procedurally unfair
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Lack of procedural fairness in assessment

Crimes.Crime_Name: Withholding material facts under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Officer reasonably found inadmissibility for withholding material facts
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review under s. 72(1) of the Act
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Flawed verification and lack of procedural fairness
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to verify accurately and provide fair process
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Affidavits from employer supporting applicant’s claims
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Materiality of withheld facts under IRPA
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: s. 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remitted for reconsideration by a different officer
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Alleged withholding of material facts regarding employment
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictory evidence from employer not adequately addressed
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Applicant denied opportunity to explain discrepancies
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Officer discredited applicant without sufficient basis
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenged as unreasonable and procedurally unfair
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Lack of procedural fairness in evaluation
